Rules.InvariantScript: LookUp(c_EnvironmentVariable,'Display Name'="Text Medium Font Size").'Default Value'
ColorValue( LookUp('Environment Variable Definitions', 'Display Name'="Common Primary Background").'Default Value')//_VarGblAppColors.PrimaryBg

If(
    ThisItem.title = "Product Category",
    Reset(radioCategory) && Set(
        varcategory,
        radioCategory.Selected.'Category Code'
    ),
    ThisItem.title = "Product Group",
    Reset(radioProductGrp) && Set(
        varProductGrp,
        radioProductGrp.Selected.'Group Code'
    ),
    ThisItem.title = "Variant",
   // Reset(radioVariant) && 
    Clear(colSelectedVariant),
    ThisItem.title = "Discount",
    Reset(radioDiscount) && Set(
        varHigherVal,
        radioDiscount.Selected.vall
    )
);
Remove(
    selectedFilterValues,
    ThisItem
)

/*
If(IsBlank(LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link'), SampleImage, LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link')
*/
ThisItem.'Image URL'

If(
    If (
        !IsBlank(colCustomerMapping),
        If(
            !IsBlank(
                Filter(
                    OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                    'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
                )
            ),
            LookUp(
                OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
                'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
            ).'Discount %',
            "0"
        ),
        !IsBlank(colStateMapping),
        If(
            !IsBlank(
                Filter(
                    OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                    'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
                )
            ),
            LookUp(
                OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
                'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
            ).'Discount %',
            "0"
        ),
        !IsBlank(colRegionMapping),
        If(
            !IsBlank(
                Filter(
                    OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                    'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
                )
            ),
            LookUp(
                OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
                'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
            ).'Discount %',
            "0"
        )
    ) > 0,
    true,
    false
)

"(" & If (
    !IsBlank(colCustomerMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        "0"
    ),
    !IsBlank(colStateMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        "0"
    ),
    !IsBlank(colRegionMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        "0"
    )
) & "% Off)"

If(
    If (
    !IsBlank(colCustomerMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        "0"
    ),
    !IsBlank(colStateMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        "0"
    ),
    !IsBlank(colRegionMapping),
    If(
        !IsBlank(
            Filter(
                OfflineProductOfferHeaderCollection,
                'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && ('Active From' <= Today()) && ('Active To' >= Today())
            )
        ),
        LookUp(
            OfflineProductOfferLinesCollection,
            'Product Offer Header'.'Offer ID' = First(colOfferHeaderId).Value && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
        ).'Discount %',
        0
    ) )> 0,
    true,
    false
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString:
If(IsBlank(LookUp(
    OfflineProductPriceCollection,
    'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU' && 'Price list'.Name = varPricelist.Name
).'Ex-Factory'), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit)

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    'Product List'.OrderType = "Primary",
    LookUp(
        colPrimaryCart,
        productSKU = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
    ).quantity,
    'Product List'.OrderType = "Secondary",
    LookUp(
       colSecondaryCart,
        productSKU = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
    ).quantity
)

If(
    varSelectedTabId = 1,
    Filter(
        OfflineProductPriceCollection,
        'Price list'.Name = varPartyPricelist
    ),
    varSelectedTabId = 2,
   Filter(OfflineProductPriceCollection,'Price list'.Name = varPartyPricelist &&'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' in  FirstN(colDistinctProduct,3)),
    varSelectedTabId = 3,
    Filter(
        OfflineProductPriceCollection,
        'Price list'.Name = varPartyPricelist && 'Product SKU'.Promoted = 'Promoted (Product SKU.S)'.Yes
    )
)
